title: List of bank locations

properties.name: description
properties.value: List of bank locations shows the available banks through RuneScape that is accessible to both free players and members. Banks are indicated on the world map with the dollar () icon. There are numerous banks throughout RuneScape.

content:
The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:List of bank locations
The wiki defaults to the British convention for floor numbering: Ground floor, first floor, etc. This may be changed by clicking the moon icon at the top right of the site.

List of bank locations shows the available banks through RuneScape that is accessible to both free players and members. Banks are indicated on the world map with the dollar () icon. There are numerous banks throughout RuneScape.

Contents

  • 1 Popular banks
    • 1.1 Non-members
    • 1.2 Members
  • 2 Fastest Access
    • 2.1 Items
    • 2.2 Spells and Teletabs
  • 3 Free-to-play banks
    • 3.1 Asgarnia
    • 3.2 Misthalin
    • 3.3 Kharidian Desert
    • 3.4 Kandarin
    • 3.5 Wilderness
  • 4 Members-only banks
    • 4.1 Asgarnia
    • 4.2 Dwarven Realm
    • 4.3 Fremennik Province
    • 4.4 Great Kourend
    • 4.5 Kandarin
    • 4.6 Karamja
    • 4.7 Kebos Lowlands
    • 4.8 Kharidian Desert
    • 4.9 Misthalin
    • 4.10 Morytania
    • 4.11 Tirannwn
    • 4.12 Wilderness
    • 4.13 Islands
    • 4.14 Other places
    • 4.15 Extras
  • 5 See also

Popular banks[edit | edit source]

Popular banks are good for trading, as many players tend to congregate at these banks. After the introduction of the Grand Exchange, the popularity of banks has diminished, and the number of players has reduced somewhat.

Non-members[edit | edit source]

  • The banks in Falador and Varrock are good trading spots, as well as the bank in Al-Kharid for crafting items.
  • Falador East Bank was often used for trading coal, due to the close proximity of the Mining Guild, and iron ore due to the Dwarven Mines and Rimmington mine also being nearby.
  • Varrock West Bank, which is near the Grand Exchange, is popular because of the many people banking and withdrawing items and coins for the Grand Exchange.
  • There is a Bank Tutor in Lumbridge Castle on the 2nd floor[UK]3rd floor[US] to help new players using banks.
  • Edgeville bank is one of the closest banks to the Wilderness, and players exploring the Wilderness and player killers often make use of the bank for supplies.
  • The Grand Exchange area with its bank has also become a very busy bank at times with players buying almost anything.

Members[edit | edit source]

  • The banks in Ardougne, Seers' Village, and Catherby are popular banks on members-only worlds.
  • Seers' Village is full of alchemists, as yew and magic logs are cut there, flax is picked, and nature runes are sold to players who wish to cast High Level Alchemy on the final products from fletching the former materials into longbows.
  • Burgh de Rott's bank becomes accessible during the quest In Aid of the Myreque when repaired and afterwards.

Fastest Access[edit | edit source]

While running, a player can travel 2 tiles in 0.6 seconds, one game tick. In addition, for locations with a banker, using the Bank Banker option allows the user to bank 1 tile sooner.

Free-to-play banks[edit | edit source]

The following banks are available to all players.

Asgarnia[edit | edit source]

  • Falador:
    • Falador West Bank is south of the hairdresser's shop and north of Herquin's Gems.
    • Falador East Bank is south of Falador Park and north of the Mining Guild entrance.
  • Port Sarim:
    • A bank deposit box is located near the Monks of Entrana.

Misthalin[edit | edit source]

  • Lumbridge:
    • Located on the 2nd floor[UK]3rd floor[US] of Lumbridge Castle.
  • Varrock:
    • Varrock West Bank is near the west city gate.
    • Varrock East Bank is south-east of Varrock Palace, just north of Aubury's Rune Shop.
    • A third bank can be found in the Grand Exchange.
    • The Well of Goodwill behaves like a bank.
  • Edgeville:
    • Central part of the town, on the west bank of River Lum.
  • Draynor Village:
    • Due east of the market and fishing spots.

Kharidian Desert[edit | edit source]

  • Al-Kharid:
    • Just west of the Emir's palace near the Agility crossbow shortcut. This is the third closest bank to a furnace, behind Edgeville and Port Phasmatys.
  • Duel Arena:
    • Two bank chests can be found in the north-east side of the arena.

Kandarin[edit | edit source]

  • Castle Wars:
    • Bank chest at south side of entrance, near the Zamorak portal. Castle Wars can be accessed in free-to-play by using the portal at Clan Wars.

Wilderness[edit | edit source]

  • Ferox Enclave:
    • There is a banker and bank chest in the western section of the enclave.

Members-only banks[edit | edit source]

The following banks are available to members only.

Asgarnia[edit | edit source]

  • Burthorpe:
    • There is a bank chest and Emerald Benedict inside Rogues' Den; the latter is the closest bank to an everlasting fire.
    • Warriors' Guild west of Burthorpe on the ground floor[UK]1st floor[US] - It requires a combined Attack and Strength level of 130 or either 99 Attack or 99 Strength.
  • Crafting Guild:
    • Players who've completed the Hard Falador Diary may access a bank chest in the guild.
  • Mining Guild
    • A bank chest on the western end of the members-only section.
  • Motherlode Mine
    • A bank chest in the centre of the mine.

Dwarven Realm[edit | edit source]

  • Keldagrim:
    • Due west of the Keldagrim Palace.
    • In South Keldagrim Mine is a Dwarven Boatman who will bank gold ore at 20% commission (or 10% if ring of charos (a) is worn). Between a Rock... must be completed.
    • A bank chest is available in the Blast Furnace.

Fremennik Province[edit | edit source]

  • Barbarian Outpost:
    • There is a bank chest at Barbarian Assault.
  • Neitiznot:
    • Near the entrance and north of Mawnis Burowgar's house is a hut with four bank chests.
  • Jatizso:
    • South-western part of town.
  • Miscellania and Etceteria:
    • There is a bank on Etceteria behind the castle.
  • Rellekka:
    • Peer the Seer provides bank deposit services during The Fremennik Trials and after completion of the first part of the Fremennik Diary.
  • Lunar Isle:
    • Near the entrance. Lunar Diplomacy must be partially completed up to sailing to the isle. Completion of Dream Mentor removes the need for a Seal of passage when banking.

Great Kourend[edit | edit source]

  • Arceuus
    • The only bank of Arceuus is located just south of the library.
  • Port Piscarilius
    • At the north end of the docks.
  • Shayzien
    • There is a bank located in a large tent just south of the starting location for Tale of the Righteous.
  • Lovakengj
    • The Blast mine and Sulphur mine have bank chests, and bank buildings can be found in the Lovakite mine and north of Lizardman canyon.
  • Hosidius
    • Bank chests can be found in the Woodcutting Guild, Woodcutting Guild Ent dungeon, Vinery, at Land's End, near the Charcoal furnaces, and in the Hosidius kitchen, which is the closest bank to a source of water for filling jugs, vials, or buckets. A bank building is located at the centre of Hosidius.
  • Northern Tundras
    • A bank chest can be found at the Wintertodt Camp.

Kandarin[edit | edit source]

  • Catherby:
    • Beside the docks and to the east of the Candle Shop and is the closest bank to an allotment.
  • Camelot:
    • A bank chest appears at the Camelot Teleport spot only on PvP worlds.
  • Seers' Village:
    • Due north of the courthouse and east of the Elemental Workshop.
  • East Ardougne:
    • Ardougne North Bank is near the bank of the River Dougne in the north part of the city.
    • Ardougne South Bank is slightly south-west of the marketplace.
  • Yanille:
    • At the east side of the town is the bank.
  • Legends' Guild:
    • Up the east ladder on the 2nd floor[UK]3rd floor[US], there is a bank chest.
  • Castle Wars:
    • Bank chest at south side of entrance, near the Zamorak portal.
  • Tree Gnome Stronghold:
    • Directly south-west of the Spirit tree, near some yew and magic trees and up some wooden stairs is the bank.
    • In the west branch of the 1st floor[UK]2nd floor[US] of the Grand Tree is another bank.
  • Piscatoris Fishing Colony:
    • Centre of the colony. Swan Song must be completed to use this bank. This is the closest bank to a general store in the game.
  • Port Khazard:
    • Bank chest and deposit box near the Fishing Trawler.
  • Hemenster:
    • Inside the Fishing Guild, 68 Fishing is required (skill boosts can be used) to use the bank.

Karamja[edit | edit source]

  • Mor Ul Rek:
    • North-west of the plaza and the North Mor Ul Rek mine.
    • North-east of the Inferno.
  • Shilo Village:
    • Located in the southern part of the village is the bank, and the Shilo Village quest must be completed.
  • Tai Bwo Wannai:
    • Rionasta runs a banking service. He charges 10 trading sticks per item deposited.

Kebos Lowlands[edit | edit source]

  • There is a bank chest and some bank booths located in the Farming Guild.
  • There is a bank chest atop Mount Karuulm and Mount Quidamortem.

Kharidian Desert[edit | edit source]

  • Nardah:
    • At the southern end of town is the bank.
  • Sophanem:
    • This bank is beneath the building in the northeast, discovered during Contact!, and accessible after said quest.
  • Shantay Pass:
    • A bank chest sits near the gateway. It's the closest bank to Kalphite Lair if travelling on foot.

Misthalin[edit | edit source]

  • Lumbridge:
    • The Culinaromancer's Chest (simply called "Chest" in-game) appears in the Lumbridge Castle cellar after the first Recipe for Disaster subquest is finished. It is a bank chest, a food shop, and a kitchen weaponry shop.
  • Varrock:
    • Cooks' Guild, only accessible after the Hard Varrock Diary is completed; second closest bank to a range in the game behind the Myths' Guild bank.
  • Wizards' Tower:
    • There is a bank chest in the lobby area for Guardians of the Rift, accessible after the quest Temple of the Eye.

Morytania[edit | edit source]

  • Canifis:
    • Due east of the pub.
  • Port Phasmatys:
    • To the south of the houses, this is the second closest bank to a furnace, behind Edgeville.
  • Burgh de Rott:
    • Located south of the ruined pub, it requires completion of In Aid of the Myreque up to the point where you repair the bank. Closest bank for Shades of Mort'ton and Barrows.
  • The Lair of Tarn Razorlor:
    • Going all the way east from the entrance will be a small room with a set of stairs past some traps. Odovacar is found here, and he charges a fee of 100gp to open your bank account. Collection box access is free. Haunted Mine must be completed.
  • Ver Sinhaza:
    • Located in the southern part of Meiyerditch. Completion of A Taste of Hope is required in order to access the castle, in which the bank can be found. The player can teleport directly to the bank by rubbing Drakan's medallion.
  • Darkmeyer:
    • Located in the central part of Darkmeyer.

Tirannwn[edit | edit source]

  • Lletya:
    • At the south-eastern corner of the city lies the bank after starting Mourning's End Part I.
  • Prifddinas:
    • Completion of Song of the Elves is required to access the city. There is one bank north of the city centre and another south-east near the entrance to Zalcano.

Wilderness[edit | edit source]

  • Mage Arena:
    • This bank is in the northernmost part of the Wilderness, accessible through a teleport lever in a small hut next to the Mage Arena. Being teleblocked will prevent access.

Islands[edit | edit source]

  • Ape Atoll:
    • In Marim only accessible after completing Monkey Madness II. A bank chest and Jumaane.
  • Void Knights' Outpost:
    • North of the Pest Control landers.
  • Mos Le'Harmless:
    • Centre of town, next to the clothes store.
    • At the Trouble Brewing lobby is a bank chest.
  • Fossil Island
    • There are 3 bank chests in Fossil Island: one just east of the ship that travels between Digsite and the island, a Bank Chest-wreck on a tiny island just north of the House on the hill accessible by boat, and one by the Volcanic mine.

Other places[edit | edit source]

  • Myths' Guild
    • On 1st floor[UK]2nd floor[US] of the guild, very close to range.
  • Zanaris:
    • On the west side of the city, players must have completed the Lost City quest.
  • Dorgesh-Kaan:
    • Near the entrance, it requires Death to the Dorgeshuun.

Extras[edit | edit source]

  • Tool leprechauns and their elven counterparts will note Farming produce if it is used on them, saving much needed inventory space. They cannot do the opposite, though.
  • Tutorial Island bank

See also[edit | edit source]

  • Bank
  • World map

{{External|rs}} {{Floor}} '''List of bank locations''' shows the available [[bank]]s through ''[[RuneScape]]'' that is accessible to both [[free players]] and [[members]]. Banks are indicated on the [[world map]] with the dollar ([[File:Bank icon.png|($)]]) [[icon]]. There are numerous banks throughout ''RuneScape''. ==Popular banks== Popular [[bank]]s are good for trading, as many players tend to congregate at these banks. After the introduction of the [[Grand Exchange]], the popularity of banks has diminished, and the number of players has reduced somewhat. ===Non-members=== *The [[bank]]s in [[Falador]] and [[Varrock]] are good trading spots, as well as the bank in [[Al-Kharid]] for [[crafting]] items. *[[Falador East Bank]] was often used for trading [[coal]], due to the close proximity of the [[Mining Guild]], and [[iron ore]] due to the [[Dwarven Mines]] and [[Rimmington mine]] also being nearby. *[[Varrock West Bank]], which is near the [[Grand Exchange]], is popular because of the many people banking and withdrawing items and coins for the Grand Exchange. *There is a [[Bank Tutor]] in [[Lumbridge Castle]] on the {{FloorNumber|uk=2}} to help new players using banks. *[[Edgeville]] bank is one of the closest banks to the [[Wilderness]], and players exploring the Wilderness and [[player killer]]s often make use of the bank for supplies. *The Grand Exchange area with its bank has also become a very busy bank at times with players buying almost anything. ===Members=== *The [[bank]]s in [[Ardougne]], [[Seers' Village]], and [[Catherby]] are popular [[bank]]s on [[members]]-only worlds. *[[Seers' Village]] is full of [[High Level Alchemy|alchemists]], as [[Yew logs|yew]] and [[magic logs]] are cut there, [[flax]] is picked, and [[nature rune]]s are sold to players who wish to cast [[High Level Alchemy]] on the final products from [[fletching]] the former materials into [[longbow]]s. *[[Burgh de Rott]]'s bank becomes accessible during the quest [[In Aid of the Myreque]] when repaired and afterwards. ==Fastest Access== While running, a player can travel 2 tiles in 0.6 seconds, one game [[tick]]. [[Seal of passage]] needed if [[Dream Mentor]] has not been completed |- |} ==Free-to-play banks== The following [[bank]]s are available to all players. ===Asgarnia=== *[[Falador]]: **[[Falador West Bank]] is south of the [[hairdresser]]'s shop and north of [[Herquin's Gems]]. **[[Falador East Bank]] is south of [[Falador Park]] and north of the [[Mining Guild]] entrance. *[[Port Sarim]]: **A [[bank deposit box]] is located near the [[Monk of Entrana|Monks of Entrana]]. ===Misthalin=== *[[Lumbridge]]: **Located on the {{FloorNumber|uk=2}} of [[Lumbridge Castle]]. *[[Varrock]]: **[[Varrock West Bank]] is near the west city gate. **[[Varrock East Bank]] is south-east of [[Varrock Palace]], just north of [[Aubury's Rune Shop]]. **A third [[bank]] can be found in the [[Grand Exchange]]. **The [[Well of Goodwill]] behaves like a bank. *[[Edgeville]]: **Central part of the town, on the west bank of [[River Lum]]. *[[Draynor Village]]: **Due east of the market and [[fishing spots]]. ===Kharidian Desert=== *[[Al-Kharid]]: **Just west of the [[Emir]]'s palace near the [[Agility]] [[crossbow (weapon)|crossbow]] [[shortcut]]. This is the third closest [[bank]] to a [[furnace]], behind [[Edgeville]] and [[Port Phasmatys]]. *[[Duel Arena]]: **Two [[bank chest]]s can be found in the north-east side of the arena. ===Kandarin=== *[[Castle Wars]]: **[[Bank chest]] at south side of entrance, near the [[Zamorak]] portal. Castle Wars can be accessed in free-to-play by using the portal at Clan Wars. === Wilderness === *[[Ferox Enclave]]: **There is a banker and [[bank chest]] in the western section of the enclave. ==Members-only banks== The following [[bank]]s are available to [[members]] only. ===Asgarnia=== *[[Burthorpe]]: **There is a [[bank chest]] and [[Emerald Benedict]] inside [[Rogues' Den]]; the latter is the closest [[bank]] to an everlasting [[fire]]. **[[Warriors' Guild]] west of Burthorpe on the {{FloorNumber|uk=0}} - It requires a combined [[Attack]] and [[Strength]] level of 130 or either 99 Attack or 99 Strength. *[[Crafting Guild]]: **Players who've completed the [[Hard Falador Diary]] may access a [[bank chest]] in the guild. *[[Mining Guild]] **A [[bank chest]] on the western end of the members-only section. *[[Motherlode Mine]] **A [[bank chest]] in the centre of the mine. ===Dwarven Realm=== *[[Keldagrim]]: **Due west of the [[Keldagrim Palace]]. **In [[South Keldagrim Mine]] is a [[Dwarven Boatman]] who will bank [[gold ore]] at 20% commission (or 10% if [[ring of charos (a)]] is worn). [[Between a Rock...]] must be completed. **A [[bank chest]] is available in the [[Blast Furnace]]. ===Fremennik Province=== *[[Barbarian Outpost]]: **There is a [[bank chest]] at [[Barbarian Assault]]. *[[Neitiznot]]: **Near the entrance and north of [[Mawnis Burowgar]]'s house is a hut with four bank chests. *[[Jatizso]]: **South-western part of town. *[[Miscellania]] and [[Etceteria]]: **There is a bank on Etceteria behind the castle. *[[Rellekka]]: **[[Peer the Seer]] provides bank deposit services during [[The Fremennik Trials]] and after completion of the first part of the [[Fremennik Diary]]. *[[Lunar Isle]]: **Near the entrance. [[Lunar Diplomacy]] must be partially completed up to sailing to the isle. Completion of [[Dream Mentor]] removes the need for a [[Seal of passage]] when banking. ===Great Kourend=== *[[Arceuus]] **The only bank of Arceuus is located just south of the library. *[[Port Piscarilius]] **At the north end of the docks. *[[Shayzien]] **There is a bank located in a large tent just south of the starting location for [[Tale of the Righteous]]. *[[Lovakengj]] **The [[Blast mine]] and [[Sulphur mine]] have [[bank chest]]s, and bank buildings can be found in the [[Lovakite mine]] and north of [[Lizardman canyon]]. *[[Hosidius]] **[[Bank chest]]s can be found in the [[Woodcutting Guild]], Woodcutting Guild Ent dungeon, [[Vinery]], at [[Land's End]], near the [[Charcoal furnace]]s, and in the [[Hosidius kitchen]], which is the [[closest]] bank to a source of [[water]] for filling jugs, vials, or buckets. A bank building is located at the centre of Hosidius. *[[Northern Tundras]] **A [[bank chest]] can be found at the [[Wintertodt Camp]]. ===Kandarin=== *[[Catherby]]: **Beside the docks and to the east of the [[Candle Shop]] and is the closest [[bank]] to an [[allotment]]. *[[Camelot]]: **A [[bank chest]] appears at the [[Camelot Teleport]] spot only on [[PvP]] worlds. *[[Seers' Village]]: **Due north of the courthouse and east of the [[Elemental Workshop (location)|Elemental Workshop]]. *[[East Ardougne]]: **[[Ardougne North Bank]] is near the bank of the [[River Dougne]] in the north part of the city. **[[Ardougne South Bank]] is slightly south-west of the marketplace. *[[Yanille]]: **At the east side of the town is the bank. *[[Legends' Guild]]: **Up the east ladder on the {{FloorNumber|uk=2}}, there is a [[bank chest]]. *[[Castle Wars]]: **[[Bank chest]] at south side of entrance, near the [[Zamorak]] portal. *[[Tree Gnome Stronghold]]: **Directly south-west of the [[Spirit tree]], near some [[yew]] and [[magic tree]]s and up some wooden stairs is the bank. **In the west branch of the {{FloorNumber|uk=1}} of the [[Grand Tree]] is another bank. *[[Piscatoris Fishing Colony]]: **Centre of the colony. [[Swan Song]] must be completed to use this bank. This is the closest bank to a [[general store]] in the game. *[[Port Khazard]]: **[[Bank chest]] and [[deposit box]] near the [[Fishing Trawler]]. *[[Hemenster]]: **Inside the [[Fishing Guild]], 68 [[Fishing]] is required (skill boosts can be used) to use the bank. ===Karamja=== *[[Mor Ul Rek]]: **North-west of the plaza and the [[North Mor Ul Rek mine]]. **North-east of the [[Inferno]]. *[[Shilo Village (location)|Shilo Village]]: **Located in the southern part of the village is the [[bank]], and the [[Shilo Village]] quest must be completed. *[[Tai Bwo Wannai]]: **[[Rionasta]] runs a banking service. He charges 10 [[trading stick]]s per item deposited. ===Kebos Lowlands=== *There is a [[bank chest]] and some [[bank booth]]s located in the [[Farming Guild]]. *There is a [[bank chest]] atop [[Mount Karuulm]] and [[Mount Quidamortem]]. ===Kharidian Desert=== *[[Nardah]]: **At the southern end of town is the [[bank]]. *[[Sophanem]]: **This bank is beneath the building in the northeast, discovered during [[Contact!]], and accessible after said quest. *[[Shantay Pass]]: **A [[bank chest]] sits near the gateway. It's the closest bank to [[Kalphite Lair]] if travelling on foot. ===Misthalin=== *[[Lumbridge]]: **The [[Culinaromancer's Chest]] (simply called "Chest" in-game) appears in the [[Lumbridge Castle]] cellar after the first [[Recipe for Disaster]] subquest is finished. It is a [[bank chest]], a [[food]] shop, and a [[kitchen weaponry]] shop. *[[Varrock]]: **[[Cooks' Guild]], only accessible after the [[Hard Varrock Diary]] is completed; second closest bank to a [[range]] in the game behind the [[Myths' Guild]] bank. *[[Wizards' Tower]]: **There is a bank chest in the lobby area for [[Guardians of the Rift]], accessible after the quest [[Temple of the Eye]]. ===Morytania=== *[[Canifis]]: **Due east of the pub. *[[Port Phasmatys]]: **To the south of the houses, this is the second closest [[bank]] to a [[furnace]], behind [[Edgeville]]. *[[Burgh de Rott]]: **Located south of the ruined pub, it requires completion of [[In Aid of the Myreque]] up to the point where you repair the bank. Closest bank for [[Shades of Mort'ton]] and [[Barrows]]. *[[The Lair of Tarn Razorlor]]: **Going all the way east from the entrance will be a small room with a set of stairs past some traps. [[Odovacar]] is found here, and he charges a fee of 100gp to open your bank account. Collection box access is free. [[Haunted Mine]] must be completed. *[[Ver Sinhaza]]: **Located in the southern part of [[Meiyerditch]]. Completion of [[A Taste of Hope]] is required in order to access the castle, in which the bank can be found. The player can teleport directly to the bank by rubbing [[Drakan's medallion]]. *[[Darkmeyer]]: **Located in the central part of [[Darkmeyer]]. ===Tirannwn=== *[[Lletya]]: **At the south-eastern corner of the city lies the [[bank]] after starting [[Mourning's End Part I]]. *[[Prifddinas]]: **Completion of [[Song of the Elves]] is required to access the city. There is one bank north of the city centre and another south-east near the entrance to [[Zalcano]]. ===Wilderness=== *[[Mage Arena]]: **This [[bank]] is in the northernmost part of the [[Wilderness]], accessible through a [[teleport lever]] in a small hut next to the Mage Arena. Being [[teleblock]]ed will prevent access. ===Islands=== *[[Ape Atoll]]: **In [[Marim]] only accessible after completing [[Monkey Madness II]]. A [[bank chest]] and [[Jumaane]]. *[[Void Knights' Outpost]]: **North of the [[Pest Control]] landers. *[[Mos Le'Harmless]]: **Centre of town, next to the clothes store. **At the [[Trouble Brewing]] lobby is a [[bank chest]]. *[[Fossil Island]] **There are 3 [[bank chest]]s in Fossil Island: one just east of the ship that travels between Digsite and the island, a [[Bank Chest-wreck]] on a tiny island just north of the House on the hill accessible by boat, and one by the Volcanic mine. ===Other places=== *[[Myths' Guild]] **On {{FloorNumber|uk=1}} of the guild, very close to range. *[[Zanaris]]: **On the west side of the city, players must have completed the [[Lost City]] quest. *[[Dorgesh-Kaan]]: **Near the entrance, it requires [[Death to the Dorgeshuun]]. ===Extras=== *[[Tool leprechaun]]s and their elven counterparts will note [[Farming]] produce if it is used on them, saving much needed inventory space. They cannot do the opposite, though. *[[Tutorial Island]] bank ==See also== *[[Bank]] *[[World map]] [[Category:List]] [[Category:Locations]] [[Category:Bank]]
